title: Man Utd midfielder's half-brother wears 'Free Kobbie Mainoo' T-shirt

title: Donald Trump sues BBC for up to $10bn over edit of January 6 speech
description: President accuses corporation of ‘intentionally, maliciously and deceptively’ editing speech in Panorama broadcast
content:
Donald Trump has filed a lawsuit against the BBC over its editing of a speech he made to supporters in Washington before they stormed the US Capitol in 2021, requesting up to $10bn in damages.

title: Thousands of drivers wrongly fined for speeding since 2021
description: An anomaly identified by National Highways caused thousands of incorrect speed camera activations.
content:
Thousands of drivers could have speeding fines cancelled after a fault saw some cameras falsely triggered on English A roads and motorways.
National Highways said it had found 2,650 wrongful speed camera activations since 2021 due to a delay between ... [1355 chars]

title: Paranormal Activity review - this fright night leaves you spellbound and spooked
description: With expert direction and eye-catching stagecraft, the tension is ramped up in a new play inspired by the film franchise

title: Nissan begins production of new electric car in Sunderland
description: Launch of third generation of Leaf follows investment of more than £450m into model, including £300m direct to UK
content:
Nissan has started the production of its latest electric car in Sunderland, a crucial step in the UK automotive industry’s transition away from petrol and diesel.
